DOC.brief_title: Measurement Patient Reported Outcomes Renal Transplant Patients With And Without Gastrointestinal ( GI ) Symptoms
DOC.criteria: Patient receive kidney transplant least 1 month prior study MMF part treatment least 2 week . Eligible convert myfortic GI complaint currently experience GI complaint stable current immunosuppressive regimen . At least 18 year age ; Willing provide write informed consent ; Able meet study requirement include complete paper questionnaire complete two study visit . GI symptom assume know caused MPA therapy recent acute rejection least 1 week prior study . Breastfeeding pregnant woman . Patients psychiatric illness . Underlying acute medical intervention hospitalization Receiving investigational drug within 30days prior study .
